column4: does anyone know if its possible to view an NTFS drive with ubuntu???

cannot access archive: No such file or directory
well i just ran sudo perl Makefile.PL and that worked but now the readme says to run make but it says there is no file etc
it's in the repositories. Try "sudo apt-get install libgeo-ipfree-perl"

i couldnt find it the way u sed but i found it thru synaptic
